# PCA plots

The principle component analysis (PCA) plot displays, by default, the first 2 PCâ€™s in the dataset and colors study groups.

```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
df <- iris[1:4]
pca_res <- prcomp(df, scale. = TRUE)

pca_final <- as.data.frame(pca_res$x)
pca_final$Species <- iris$Species

ggplot(data = pca_final, aes(x=PC1,y=PC2)) + geom_point(aes(color=Species),size=1.5)
```
